text: The Bulgaria men's national field hockey team represents Bulgaria in international field hockey competitions. ==Tournament record== Bulgaria have never qualified for the Summer Olympics, World Cup or the EuroHockey Championship. ===European championships=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" !colspan=11|EuroHockey Championships record |- !Year !Level !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |2005 |colspan=9|Did not enter |- | 2007 |IV||6th||4||1||0||3||7||9|| |- | 2009 |IV||3rd||6||1||2||3||7||14|| |- | 2011 |IV||3rd||4||2||0||2||13||8|| |- | 2013 |IV||2nd||4||2||0||2||9||7|| |- |2015 |colspan=9 rowspan=4|Did not enter |- |2017 |- |2019 |- |2021 |- !Total||colspan=2|Highest: IV||18||6||2||10||36||38||– |} ===World League=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|FIH Hockey World League record |- !Season !Position !Round ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |2012–13 |colspan=8|Did not participate |- |2014–15 |Unranked||Round 1||4||2||0||2||4||22 |- |2016–17 |colspan=8|Did not participate |- !Total||N/A||Round 1 (1x)||4||2||0||2||4||22 |} ==See also== Bulgaria women's national field hockey team ==References== Category:European men's national field hockey teams Field hockey National team Category:Men's sport in Bulgaria
title: Bulgaria men's national field hockey team
